column4: several properties in Kandal province were destroyed by high winds and heavy rain. 6 houses were damaged
column5: leaving 1 seriously injured and 4 others needing medical attention in one commune
column6: while 7 houses were damaged in another
column9: killing two and injuring seven (including a 5 year old boy and another 8 year old) in Svay Chrum district.------Information/photos from RASMEI Kampuchea and POST NEWS
